long_description: Vibram rubber-based golf discs offer excellent durability and grip for the casual player. This set of 3 Disc Golf discs contains a Lace distance driver, Ibex mid-range, and Ridge approach/putter. Fast distance Lace driver delivers amazing glide and accuracy with 167 - 169 grams for optimal arm speed while preserving control in the wind. Versatile, controllable and forgiving Ibex mid disc flies well at a wide range of speeds and gives good distance with 170 - 172 grams. If you can reach the basket, use the straight-flying Ridge approach/putter; its 173 - 175 grams for consistent, reliable shots. The Vibram Disc Golf Set provides extra durability with the natural resiliency of rubber and comfortable grip in any weather.
short_description: Vibram rubber-based golf discs offer excellent durability and grip for the casual player. This set of 3 Disc Golf discs contains a Lace distance driver, Ibex mid-range, and Ridge approach/putter.
